io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.block.tesr

Class HorizontalRotatedTesr<T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.renderer.tileentity.TileEntityRenderer<T>
      • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.block.tesr.HorizontalRotatedTesr<T>

  • public abstract class HorizontalRotatedTesr<T extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity>
extends net.minecraft.client.renderer.tileentity.TileEntityRenderer<T>
    A TileEntityRenderer that before calling the actual render code rotates the MatrixStack depending on the horizontal facing. This may only be used with blocks that have the property BlockStateProperties.HORIZONTAL_FACING
